channel.title: My New Windows Royale Theme
channel.description: This is what it looks like: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/1686/newroyalthemerj5.png[/img][/URL] Just today,I heard Vista had bugs,etc.So I removed it-Don't feel like re-installing windows again. So this is basically what it looks like,It looks better than vista IMO. And it takes up A LOT less space,my comp is running way faster now. What are your opinions on Vista and royale? Btw Here is the download link for ROYALE: http://www.softpedia.com/progDownload/Royale-Theme-for-WinXP-Download-13027.html Don't Download (us) Download (ro)

item.title: My New Windows Royale Theme
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:9, topic:158152”]You know what I think looks better than vista?

http://www.moparisthebest.com/images/desktop1.png[/quote]

I really don’t think it would wow the average person. It might look cool to computer-oriented person, but an ordinary person can’t grasp how difficult it is to implement something like that. To a computer-knowledgeable person, the aliasing kills it.

Read full topic
